entry.title: Gov't: No nationwide rollout of new COVID-19 alert system by next week

media:group.media:title: Gov't: No nationwide rollout of new COVID-19 alert system by next week
media:group.media:description:
Malacañang denied on Monday the government would implement nationwide by October 1 a new alert level system against COVID-19. Video courtesy of PTV

entry.title: DOH: Delta now most common variant in PH, with additional 319 cases | ABS-CBN News

media:group.media:title: DOH: Delta now most common variant in PH, with additional 319 cases | ABS-CBN News
media:group.media:description:
The virulent Delta variant is now the most common lineage in the Philippines, the Department of Health said Monday, as it reported an additional 319 cases of the more transmissible virus.

entry.title: Reconciliation between Duterte, Pacquiao PDP-Laban factions unlikely: officer | ABS-CBN News

media:group.media:title: Reconciliation between Duterte, Pacquiao PDP-Laban factions unlikely: officer | ABS-CBN News
media:group.media:description:
An ally of President Rodrigo Duterte said it appeared 'impossible' for their group to reconcile with the PDP-Laban wing headed by Sen. Manny Pacquiao.

entry.title: Duterte-backed PDP-Laban wing says no 2022 poll talks with Bongbong Marcos | ABS-CBN News

media:group.media:title: Duterte-backed PDP-Laban wing says no 2022 poll talks with Bongbong Marcos | ABS-CBN News
media:group.media:description:
The PDP-Laban faction supported by President Rodrigo Duterte said on Monday it so far has no negotiations for an alliance with former Sen. Bongbong Marcos for the 2022 elections.

entry.title: DepEd coordinating with authorities to probe online group promoting cheating | ABS-CBN News

media:group.media:title: DepEd coordinating with authorities to probe online group promoting cheating | ABS-CBN News
media:group.media:description:
